otherNames: Guai Shou He Xin, Guài Shòu Hé Xīn, Hunt Monster Core, Monster Hunting Core, モースト・コア～最強ハンターへの道～, 怪狩核芯
synopsis: Chen Ren possessed the bloodline to control the mysterious fierce Taotie, and was coveted by various forces, causing his family to be ruined. After surviving, Chen Ren made many friends and began to understand this world full of hunters and monster hunters. In the follow-up revenge, Chen Ren and the monster-hunting Taotie embarked on a journey of engulfing the upgraded core!
